spec_data.Name: perl-Log-Any-Adapter-Callback
spec_data.Description:
This adapter lets you specify callback subroutine to be called by
Log::Any's logging methods (like $log->debug(), $log->error(), etc) and
detection methods (like $log->is_warning(), $log->is_fatal(), etc.).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:56:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Send Log::Any logs to a subroutine
